title: The Laws of the Island of Antigua...(Vol. 2). London: printed by Samuel Bagster, 1805
description: The Laws of the Island of Antigua: Consisting of the Acts of the Leeward Islands, Commencing 8th November 1690 Ending 21st April 1798; and the Acts of Antigua Commencing 10th April 1668, Ending 7th May 1804: With, Prefixed to Each Volume, Analytical Tables of the Titles of the Acts; And, at the End of the Whole, a Copious Digested Index. (Vol. 2). London: printed by Samuel Bagster, 1805.
